name: Variety Stores
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants offering a varied but limited selection of merchandise in
the low or popular price range. Such stores generally are not
departmentalized, do not offer proprietary charge or credit cards,
and do not deliver merchandise. Variety stores offer merchandise
similar to that sold by discount stores, but operate on a much smaller
scale.
